Blogs about Blogging

3.00 from 1 vote

Created: Sep. 27th, 2009

Tags:Blogs, blogging

 

  • Problogger - Darren Rowse

    Via neilcreek

    The best place to go to hone your blogging skills created by the experienced blogger of Digital Photography School. Try the Problogger 31 Days to a Better Blog challenge to give your new blog a head start.

  • Copyblogger

    Via affiliatesummit

    A team of bloggers, headed by Brian Clark, write quality articles on how to be a better blogger.

  • Blogussion

    Via Seth1492

    A group of young (teens), highly dedicated bloggers, share tips and tricks they learn while on the road from small blogger to big blogger

  • Blogsessive

    Wordress pro, Alex Cristache, shares his wealth of web design knowledge. Most recently he has been doing a series on Corporate Blogging.

  • Daily Blogging Tips

    Daniel Scocco started blogging in 2005 and kept Daily Blogging Tips as a place to keep and share all of the lessons he learned a long the way. The site boasts a clean design, and large archives of valuable content for bloggers of all niches.

  • Shoemoney

    Via Dave Dugdale

    One of the best resources for learning about making money online, particulary on how to make money from your blog.

  • John Chow dot com

    Via John Chow dot Com

    He makes thousands of dollars a month from his blog where he write about how to make money blogging.

  • QuickOnlineTips

    Blogging tips, and news about technology and new media

  • Lorelle on Wordpress

    Tips and advice on blogging and using Wordpress as a blogging platform.

  • BloggingPro

    News, themes and plugins for blogging
